title: Boris Pavić
text:
Boris Pavić (born 4 December 1973) is a Croatian <a href="manager%20%28association%20football%29">football manager</a> and former <a href="football%20player">player</a>.
He was appointed manager of Solin in December 2018. He previously coached <a href="NK%20%C5%A0iroki%20Brijeg">Široki Brijeg</a>, but left in August 2018 after two-and-a-half months in the role.
